name: Triple Blocks
description:
Triple Blocks is a simple but fun puzzle game. Combine blocks of the same color to clear the grid! It's surprisingly addictive.

  • Moving blocks makes them switch places
  • You can make both vertical and horizontal lines
  • Watch out not to leave one or two blocks of a color, or you'll lose the game!

Easy, medium and hard difficulties.

  • Endless mode, survive as long as possible
  • Keep the board empty! If the grid is filled completely, you lose.
  • New blocks get added automatically
  • This goes increasingly fast, so move fast to keep up!

More modes and tweaks/updates may be added in the future.

If you have any feedback or tips, I'd love to hear about them in the comments! And if you enjoyed it, consider a small donation to help develop new features.
